description:
As he`s visiting Izzy and Tom`s secret home, Justice is attacked by Il, an assassin from the Kingdom who has possessed Touko`s body. Meanwhile at the school, another assassin, Lakha, attacks Izzy. Now that Princess Aryabhata has taken over the rule of the Kingdom of Selinistan, the race to claim the "triggerless tattoo" has been set in motion.
Source: crunchyroll
